DataElement.preferredName: FACIT-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form Past Seven Days Short of Breath Severity Did Not Walk Faster than Normal Speed Without Stopping Reason
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Persons' stated indication of the reason why in the past 7 days they did not walk faster than usual speed for 1/2 mile or almost 1 km without stopping, using one of two text responses.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: FACIT-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form How True Past Week Dyspnea Severity Did Not Walk Faster than Normal Speed Without Stopping
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A patient-reported outcome measure designed to evaluate an individual's shortness of breath across ten functional activities over the past 7 days._A question about an individual's agreement with a statement._The most recent week, including today._A question about how short of breath an individual gets or got when walking faster than their usual speed for one half mile without stopping._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability._Difficult, painful breathing or shortness of breath._Used of the degree of something undesirable e.g. pain or weather; also, strictness._A question about the reason why an individual did not walk faster than their usual speed for one half mile without stopping.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A patient-reported outcome measure designed to evaluate an individual's shortness of breath across ten functional activities over the past 7 days.

Concepts.definition: A patient-reported outcome measure designed to evaluate an individual's shortness of breath across ten functional activities over the past 7 days.

Property.preferredName: How True Past Week Dyspnea Severity Did Not Walk Faster than Normal Speed Without Stopping
Property.preferredDefinition: A question about an individual's agreement with a statement.:The most recent week, including today.:Difficult, painful breathing or shortness of breath.:Severity; used of the degree of something undesirable e.g. pain or weather.:A question about the reason why an individual did not walk faster than their usual speed for one half mile without stopping.

Concepts.definition: A question about an individual's agreement with a statement.
The most recent week. May include the present day.
An uncomfortable sensation of difficulty breathing. It may present as an acute or chronic sign of an underlying respiratory or heart disorder.
Used of the degree of something undesirable e.g. pain or weather; also, strictness.

Concepts.longName: Did Not Walk Faster than Normal Speed Without Stopping
Concepts.definition: A question about the reason why an individual did not walk faster than their usual speed for one half mile without stopping.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.origin: FACIT-Dyspnea SF:FACIT-dyspnea (dyspnoea)-short form, Seung W. Choi, Ph.D., David Cella, Ph.D., R 01 October 2012

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An explanation of the cause of an individual not being able to complete an activity included in the FACIT Dyspnea questionnaire.

PermissibleValues.value: I did not do this activity for some other reason (including not having a chance to do it, other health issues etc).
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: I did not do this activity for some other reason (including not having a chance to do it, other health issues etc).

ValueMeaning.preferredName: I did not do this activity for some other reason (including not having a chance to do it, other health issues etc).
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has not done an activity for some reason not listed.

Concepts.longName: Did Not Do This Activity for Some Other Reason
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has not done an activity for some reason not listed.

PermissibleValues.value: I have stopped trying, or knew I could not do this activity because of my shortness of breath.
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: I have stopped trying, or knew I could not do this activity because of my shortness of breath.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: I have stopped trying, or knew I could not do this activity because of my shortness of breath.
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has stopped trying, or knew they could not do this activity because of their shortness of breath.

Concepts.longName: Have Stopped Trying Because of Shortness of Breath
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has stopped trying, or knew they could not do this activity because of their shortness of breath.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

Concepts.definition: An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Please indicate why you did n
ReferenceDocuments.description: Please indicate why you did not do this in the past 7 days:

ReferenceDocuments.name: Scoring Manual Link
ReferenceDocuments.description: Scoring and Interpretation materials are accessible after registration on the FACIT website.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value set in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. The URL citation is provided so that caDSR users can obtain materials related to instructions for administering and/or scoring the measure. Changes may not be made to these documents.  In cases where retaining the question set intact to preserve the validity and reliability are not as important as advancing the science, questions may be used individually or in combination with other measure questions.
